short_summary: EE517-230500-B STANDING OFFER - GENERAL CONTRACTOR - HAVRE-ST-PIERRE
description: All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be contained in the file and submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on January 31 2023. PWGSC, on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, is issuing this Request for Standing Offers for the service of General Contractor - Havre-St-Pierre located in Havre-St-Pierre, Quebec, Canada, as detailed in Annex A.
tags: Specialty Building and Tr Trade Services
